articles.description: An eight-year-old girl and a man are seriously injured in a shooting, Met Police say.

articles.title: ‘At 31, I was told if I didn’t stop drinking, I could die’

articles.description: The presenter says she's "on the mend" and feels "very lucky" after having a benign tumour removed.

articles.description: In Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, residents say lessons have not been learned from Storm Dennis.
articles.title: Pontypridd: Residents angry after Storm Bert hits

articles.description: The former German chancellor talks about Ukraine, Putin’s nuclear threat - and how she handled Trump.
articles.title: Angela Merkel on Putin, Trump and defending her legacy

articles.description: A video posted online shows a man in military clothing identify himself as James Scott Rhys Anderson, 22.
articles.title: British man captured by Russia while fighting with Ukraine
